metadata.title: TESOON Unisex Snapback Hat Flat Bill Hip Hop Hat Embroidery Design
features: Structured firm front plain 6 panel flat brim cap with 6 embroidered eyelets.
Suitable for casual, hip-hop ,sports,street dancer , summer beach activities.
For the Seasons: Spring, Summer, Autumn.
description: : 80% polyester+20% cotton. Using machine embroidery, smooth, three-dimensional pattern strong, exquisite beauty, highlight the sense of quality. This hat is used widen and cotton sweatband, when you wear it you will feel more breathable and comfortable. High quality, soft, thick, warm, cute, fashionable, fits boys and girls.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "5.91 x 3.94 x 5.91 inches", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "June 29, 2017"}
